A lot of twists and deaths. Also\, the laws of physics don't apply in this alternate universe so people don't explode when you shove them out of an air lock or blow up their ship and...what am I missing. Oh ya\, Snoke's really just a smoke screen. The Porgs are the evil geniuses that run the galaxy....good GOD wouldn't that have made for a better movie?
